verses.text: And Elijah the Tishbite , \add who was\add* of the inhabitants of Gilead , said unto Ahab , \add As\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* God of Israel liveth , before whom I stand , there shall not be dew nor rain these years , but according to my word.\f + \fr 17.1 \ft Elijah: Heb. Elijahu: Gr. Elias\f*
And the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto him, saying ,
Get thee hence, and turn thee eastward , and hide thyself by the brook Cherith , that \add is\add* before Jordan.
And it shall be, \add that\add* thou shalt drink of the brook ; and I have commanded the ravens to feed thee there.
So he went and did according unto the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: for he went and dwelt by the brook Cherith , that \add is\add* before Jordan.
And the ravens brought him bread and flesh in the morning , and bread and flesh in the evening ; and he drank of the brook.
And it came to pass after a while , that the brook dried up , because there had been no rain in the land.\f + \fr 17.7 \ft after…: Heb. at the end of days\f* \p
¶ And the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto him, saying ,
Arise , get thee to Zarephath , which \add belongeth\add* to Zidon , and dwell there: behold, I have commanded a widow woman there to sustain thee.\f + \fr 17.9 \ft Zarephath: Gr. Sarepta\f*

So he arose and went to Zarephath. And when he came to the gate of the city , behold, the widow woman \add was\add* there gathering of sticks : and he called to her, and said , Fetch me, I pray thee, a little water in a vessel , that I may drink.
And as she was going to fetch \add it\add*, he called to her, and said , Bring me, I pray thee, a morsel of bread in thine hand.

And she said , \add As\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God liveth , I have not a cake , but an handful of meal in a barrel , and a little oil in a cruse : and, behold, I \add am\add* gathering two sticks , that I may go in and dress it for me and my son , that we may eat it, and die.
And Elijah said unto her, Fear not; go \add and\add* do as thou hast said : but make me thereof a little cake first , and bring \add it\add* unto me, and after make for thee and for thy son.

For thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* God of Israel , The barrel of meal shall not waste , neither shall the cruse of oil fail , until the day \add that\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* sendeth rain upon the earth.  +  r 17.14  t sendeth: Heb. giveth *
And she went and did according to the saying of Elijah : and she, and he, and her house , did eat \add many\add* days.\f + \fr 17.15 \ft many…: or, a full year\f*

\add And\add* the barrel of meal wasted not, neither did the cruse of oil fail , according to the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which he spake by Elijah.\f + \fr 17.16 \ft by: Heb. by the hand of\f* \p
¶ And it came to pass after these things , \add that\add* the son of the woman , the mistress of the house , fell sick ; and his sickness was so sore , that there was no breath left in him.
And she said unto Elijah , What have I to do with thee, O thou man of God ? art thou come unto me to call my sin to remembrance , and to slay my son ?
And he said unto her, Give me thy son. And he took him out of her bosom , and carried him up into a loft , where he abode , and laid him upon his own bed.

And he cried unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and said , O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* my God , hast thou also brought evil upon the widow with whom I sojourn , by slaying her son ?

And he stretched himself upon the child three times , and cried unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and said , O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* my God , I pray thee, let this child’s soul come into him again.  +  r 17.21  t stretched: Heb. measured *  +  r 17.21  t into…: Heb. into his inward parts *
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* heard the voice of Elijah ; and the soul of the child came into him again , and he revived.
And Elijah took the child , and brought him down out of the chamber into the house , and delivered him unto his mother : and Elijah said , See , thy son liveth. \p
¶ And the woman said to Elijah , Now by this I know that thou \add art\add* a man of God , \add and\add* that the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in thy mouth \add is\add* truth.
